scriptedContentFragment.name: Timeline
scriptedContentFragment.contentScript:
#if($core_v2_widget.IsInWidgetPreviewMode) $core_v2_widget.Hide() #end $core_v2_widget.ExecuteFile('CoriaTimeline.vm')
#registerEndOfPageHtml ('coria.timeline') ## end of page HTML ## ## #end #registerEndOfPageHtml ( ) #end
scriptedContentFragment.configuration:
<propertyGroup id="options" resourceName="Options"> <property id="fragmentHeader" resourceName="CF_Title" dataType="string" defaultValue="${resource:widget_name}" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.ContentFragmentTokenStringControl, Telligent.Evolution.Controls" /> <property id="fragmentDescription" resourceName="CF_Description" dataType="string" defaultValue="${resource:widget_description}" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.ContentFragmentTokenStringControl, Telligent.Evolution.Controls" /> <property id="source_type" resourceName="source_type" descriptionResourceName="source_type_description" dataType="string" defaultValue="InternalRestJsonApiSource"> <propertyValue orderNumber="0" value="InternalRestJsonApiSource" resourceName="rest_api_source" descriptionResourceName="rest_api_source" text="REST API"/> <propertyValue orderNumber="1" value="InternalWidgetApiSource" resourceName="widget_api_source" text="Widget API" /> <propertyValue orderNumber="2" value="ArcGisServerSource" resourceName="ags_source" text="ArcGIS Server URL" /> <propertyValue orderNumber="3" value="JsonSource" resourceName="json_source" text="JSON URL" /> </property> </propertyGroup>
<propertyGroup id="RestApiSourceOpts" resourceName="RestApiSourceOpts"> <property id="restapisearchtype"></property> </propertyGroup>
<propertyGroup id="JsonUrlSourceOpts" resourceName="JsonUrlSourceOpts"> <property ></property> </propertyGroup>
<propertyGroup id="ArcGisServerSourceOpts" resourceName="ArcGisServerSourceOpts"> <property ></property> </propertyGroup>
<propertyGroup id="WidgetApiSourceOpts" resourceName="WidgetApiSourceOpts"> <property id="app_type" resourceName="app_type" descriptionResourceName="app_type_description" defaultValue="true" controlType="Telligent.Evolution.Controls.CheckboxListControl, Telligent.Evolution.Controls" > <propertyValue orderNumber="0" value="blogs" resourceName="blogs" /> <propertyValue orderNumber="1" value="forums" resourceName="forums" /> <propertyValue orderNumber="2" value="wikis" resourceName="wikis" text="ArcGIS Server URL" /> <propertyValue orderNumber="3" value="media galleries" resourceName="media" text="JSON URL" />
</property> > </propertyGroup>

language.resource: Reads the selected source type and provides a filter
Blogs, Forums, Wikis, Media via Widget Api
pick one source type to use
